Translations.Text: Al DI aparten all sovereignty de heavens ter! Tag Hor Judgment ven pas ke est when falsifiers perd
Vi seg cxiu community kneeling Cxiu community est vok view their record Hodiaux vi get pag por cxio vi done
This est our record gxi utters truth vi! Ni recording cxio vi did
As por those kred work righteousness their Lord admit them His mercy! This est great triumf
As por those disbelieve My revelations Est recited vi vi torn arrogant est wicked popol
When gxi proklam di promes est truth ke Hor Judgment inevitable vi dir Ni ne kon ki Hor est Ni est plen de konjekt gxi; ni ne est nepr
evils their works igx evident al them tre ajx ili mok ven haunt them
Gxi proklam Hodiaux ni forges vi just as vi forges meeting this tag. Your abode est hellfire vi ne hav helpers
This est vi sorb di revelations en vain preoccupied 1 life. Consequently ili neniam exit therefrom nor vol ili pretekst
Al DI aparten all lauxd; Lord heavens Lord ter Lord univers
Al Him aparten all supremacy heavens ter! Li est Almighty Sagx
